KA.IUHCI.content: general premise that the world is constituted as a system [presupposition] > even feeble traces (schwachen Spuren) of this state become very important > at least there is some maintenance if not progress

source.title: Idea for a Universal History with Cosmopolitan Intent
source.author: KA
